attributes.action: dog killer must be banned frm keeping any animal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: pleads guilty to stabbing to death two pet dogs,he receives no ban at all from keeping a pet,the judge failed to read in court he was seen on cctv playing with pets before he butchered them to death as they tryed to escape.

rejection.details: If this relates to an individual case this is a matter for the courts.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
